summary: end of shift feature
description: description end of shift helps balance out cash in the drawer at the middle of a business day
managers run end of shift report to count how much money they have in the cash drawer and credit card machine
because end of shift happens at least twice per day its easier for restaurant to track any discrepancies
in nybc neihu branch the shifts are as follows morning shift manager counts morning shift money to see if they are the same as end of shift report
then places cash in separate bag
evening shift manager counts evening shift money to see if they are the same as end of shift report
then places cash in separate bag
close business day manager gathers all the money and counts them if they are the same as the pos end of day report
manager needs to be able to close shift a
pick which shift to close morning evening after release shifts can be added and removed via web admin
b
close a shift i
this marks all checks that have been checked out to belong to the selected shift ii
checks that already belong to a shift wont be affected iii
after closing a shift manager can a shift in case there were any mistakes in the checks
after closing a shift the manager will need to generate a report
this requirement is captured in helps balance out cash in the drawer at the middle of a business day powil need to create requirement

summary: pos multiple credit card terminal
description: july sean powil confirmed that nybc pos is not set up to handle union pay cashier need to manually key in amount on the card reader for payments made by union pay
powil confirmed that nybc pos is set up to handle amex
cashier does not need to manually key in amount on the card reader
july sean talked to systex and identified flows
taipei team feels option a is easier
also the current flow we are following a
pos sends amount and card type to credit card reader cashier card and then credit card tells pos success or fail
b

pos sends a request to card reader asking for the card type this only works for but not union pay cashier card reader tells the pos card type pos sends another request with amount and card type card reader processes transaction and tells pos success or fail
for option a to happen checkout screen has to have steps to make a credit card transaction
step choose from card types general visa mastercard jcb amex union pay step choose from card readers is the main credit card reader nybc uses
it should support the following cards amex union pay specifications this model should use change value of nexsysmode to in the file ecr.cfg and data format on this link is the backup card reader

it should support the following cards amex union pay specifications this model should use and data format on this link for nybc we need to support visa mastercard jcb amex and union pay we need to support visa amex and union pay
